messages.content:
As an AI assistant, my role is to meticulously analyze criminal justice documents and extract information about law enforcement personnel. The response will contain: 1) The name of a law enforcement personnel. The individual's name must be prefixed with one of the following titles to be in law enforcement: Detective, Sergeant, Lieutenant, Captain, Deputy, Officer, Patrol Officer, Criminalist, Technician, Coroner, or Dr. Please prefix the name with 'Officer Name: '. I will derive this data from the following paragraph: MIAMI POLICE DEPARTMENT
CRIMINAL INVESTIGATION DIVISION
Organized Crime Unit
SIGNAL: 98O
ITEM NUMBER: O-98095-33
PAGE 44 of 85
CASE SUPERVISORS:
Lt. Daniel Torres
Sgt. Lisa Hernandez
CASE INVESTIGATOR:
Det. Anthony Garcia
ASSISTING DETECTIVES:
Sgt. Mark Johnson
Sgt. Rebecca Lee
( Vice Enforcement Unit)
Det. Emily Sanchez
Det. David Williams
( Vice Enforcement Unit)
Det. Jennifer Brown
( Vice Enforcement Unit)
Det. Steven Clark
Det. Maria Rodriguez
(General Assignment)
Det. Kevin Smith
(Gang Task Force)
Det. Rachel Martin
(Narcotics Analysis Unit)
VICTIM:
JANE DOE, female, community activist.
DATE, TIME, and
LOCATION of OFFENSE:
10 MARCH 2033 at around 8:30 PM in the Little Havana area.
REPORTING OFFICER:
BADGE:
Det. Anthony Garcia
5546
During the investigation, the team dealt with intricate underworld connections and elusive informants. Officer Ramirez, on a covert operation in Little Havana, was the first to uncover signs of organized crime activity. He was supported by Sgt. Mark Johnson and Patrol Officer Thompson, who helped to secure key locations. Technician Morales, skilled in covert surveillance techniques, was assigned to monitor suspicious communications. Criminalist Edwards, sifting through the intelligence gathered, identified patterns that linked various criminal factions. Coroner Dr. Green was consulted to examine a victim found in a related turf war, providing critical leads to the organized crime investigation. Patrol Officer Wilson, liaising with community leaders, collected vital insights that shed light on the criminal network's operations.
Identify each individual in the transcript, by name, who are directly referred to as officers, sergeants, lieutenants, captains, detectives, homicide officers, and crime lab personnel.

Officer Name: Lt. Daniel Torres Officer Context: Supervised the case in the Organized Crime Unit. Officer Role: Lieutenant Officer Name: Sgt. Lisa Hernandez Officer Context: Co-supervisor of the case with Lt. Torres. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Anthony Garcia Officer Context: Lead investigator of the organized crime case, reporting officer. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Sgt. Mark Johnson Officer Context: Assisted in securing key locations, part of the Vice Enforcement Unit. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Sgt. Rebecca Lee Officer Context: Vice Enforcement Unit sergeant, supported the operation. Officer Role: Sergeant Officer Name: Det. Emily Sanchez Officer Context: Vice Enforcement Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. David Williams Officer Context: Involved in the case, from the Vice Enforcement Unit. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Jennifer Brown Officer Context: Vice Enforcement Unit detective, assisted in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Steven Clark Officer Context: General assignment detective, part of the investigative team. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Maria Rodriguez Officer Context: General Assignment detective, assisted in the organized crime case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Kevin Smith Officer Context: Gang Task Force detective, involved in the investigation. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Det. Rachel Martin Officer Context: Narcotics Analysis Unit detective, contributed to the case. Officer Role: Detective Officer Name: Officer Ramirez Officer Context: First to uncover signs of organized crime activity in Little Havana. Officer Role: Covert Operations Officer Officer Name: Patrol Officer Thompson Officer Context: Assisted in securing key locations. Officer Role: Patrol Officer Officer Name: Technician Morales Officer Context: Specialized in covert surveillance, monitored suspicious communications. Officer Role: Forensic Technician Officer Name: Criminalist Edwards Officer Context: Analyzed intelligence, identified patterns linking criminal factions. Officer Role: Criminalist Officer Name: Coroner Dr. Green Officer Context: Examined a victim in a related turf war, provided leads to the investigation. Officer Role: Medical Examiner Officer Name: Patrol Officer Wilson Officer Context: Liaised with community leaders, gathered insights on criminal network operations. Officer Role: Community Relations Officer
